name: Dreamscape: Prologue
description:
A simple hidden object game my group and I made for our semester project in school.

In Dreamscape: Prologue you find out the origin story of Aleera and how she ended up being in the position she is in the current day. Help Aleera with her experiment and find all the necessary objects to build her little machine to find out more about the mysterious crystals



Soundtrack:

https://soundcloud.com/xvamerya/sleeper
